name: COVID
description:
Play as a doctor fighting against the virus.  Summary:  My girlfriend is a doctor, so i made her this game. It took me a day to make as i wanted to get something up fast and running,  How To Play
  • A and D keys or key left and key right 
  • Collect the first aid medi kits
  • Don't Get hit by the Virus. 
Source code: 

Source code is available to download via GitHub link bellow:

https://github.com/minidylan/COVID.git
